item.title: Resume
item.description: PRATIK JAGRUT Bangalore, India A computer science engineer, an open-source enthusiast and tech speaker with a passion for programming, eager to learn new technologies and desire to work in an environment which encourages learning. I’m a goal-oriented individual with a pleasant personality and a tenacity that knows no bounds. Experience Red Hat / ​ Associate Software Engineer January 2019 - present, Bangalore, India Working on a project called ​Service Binding Operator which is an open source project.

item.title: About Pratik
item.description: Pratik currently works at Red Hat as Associate Software Engineer since January 2019. He joined Red Hat as an intern just after graduating in 2018. He holds a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Computer Science. Pratik is enthusiastic about Linux and opensource technologies. He’s fueled by his passion for understanding new technologies. He considers himself a ‘forever student', eager to learn, grow and build his professional and personal life. Pratik is also very enamoured of outdoor activities.
